EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring with Immutability 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Webinars: Spring with Immutability
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for Spring with Immutability and speaker Matt Stine. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, December 10, 2013 Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=665587754> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 665 587 754
Thank you,
